summary: Creates a new direct mailing order
description: Inserts a new direct mailing order entry (e.g. basic welcome email order) for with given data.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the receiver id on the platform.

parameters.name: email_id
parameters.description: Email identifier of the user on the platform.

parameters.name: direct_mailing_order
parameters.description: Properties of the new direct mailing order.

send_after.description: The time in seconds order deferred by.
